scripts.build: npm run clean && esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/js/app.js --minify --sourcemap && npm run copy-assets
scripts.dev: npm run clean && esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/js/app.js --sourcemap --watch & npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/css/
